column8: in pampa. there will be no services scheduled. cremation and arrangements are by carmichael-whatley funeral directors. mrs. gallagher was born may 2
column9: 1934 in grand prairie. she married herman gallagher on july 18
column11: new mexico and had been a resident of pampa since 1959. she was a member of cornerstone baptist church
column12: formerly barrett baptist church. bettye was a loving wife and mother. she was the first licensed daycare provider in pampa and provided in-home child care for many children in pampa. bettye was preceded in death by her parents
column14: and five sisters. survivors include her husband
column15: herman of the home; four sons
column18: russell gallagher and partner twyla hughes
column20: and larry gallagher and wife gay of liberal
column22: teresa gallagher of amarillo and robyn carter and husband chuck of phoenix
column24: jean walker of west virginia and june meers of oklahoma city; 10 grandchildren and 13 great grandchildren. memorials may be made to the alzheimers association
